DOC.brief_summary: Twenty ( 20 ) subject present hyperplasia enlarge prostate candidate surgery undergo single treatment ablation prostate use study device.Follow visit schedule day release hospital 1 3 month post procedure . The primary objective study explore Vaporization efficacy safety treat PBH ( Benign prostatic hyperplasia ) contact side fire fiber recommend setting .
DOC.brief_title: Ablation Efficacy Contact Side Firing Fiber Predefined Settings Treating BPH
DOC.criteria: Subject old 18 year age Subject diagnose enlarged prostate ≥ 30 gr volume Subject candidate surgery treatment Subject willing sign Informed Consent Form AUA score ≥ 12 Qmax < 15 mL/s Need perform concomitant procedure , prostate vaporization PVR > 300mL Current Urine retention Pdet < 40 cm H20 Documented suspect prostate cancer / bladder cancer Neurogenic bladder disorder / neurogenic void dysfunction Urethral strictures Previous prostatic , bladder neck , urethral surgery Known history spinal cord injury Urogenital trauma Bladder neck stricture Evidence urinary tract infection History chronic prostatitis
